itemDescription: British politician, judge, barrister and writer (1840-1928)

wikipedia_page.main: Dodgson Hamilton Madden (28 March 1840 – 6 March 1928) was an Irish Unionist Alliance Member of Parliament (MP) in the United Kingdom Parliament He was also a leading barrister, who held office as Serjeant-at-law, Attorney General for Ireland and subsequently as a Judge of the Irish High Court. The Irish Unionists were the Irish wing of the Conservative Party.
